title: David’s Offering and Death
summary: David gives generously to the temple and encourages others to do the same. He offers a heartfelt prayer of praise and thanksgiving. Solomon is officially anointed king, and the chapter ends with David’s death and Solomon’s prosperous beginning.

faq.question: How did David prepare for the temple’s future?
faq.answer: He gave his personal wealth and led Israel in joyful generosity.

faq.question: What happened after David died?
faq.answer: Solomon was firmly established as king, and David was remembered for his faithful reign.
